channel.title: Need jar maker
channel.description: um can anyone send me a good working jar maker cause a already tried a few and searched over almost whole google and i stillc an't find a workign jar maker. like i have one i try it same problem. it does everything fine but the jar file is smaller then all the files together in the original map and when i start up my client(i tried to make a jar file off) it goes fine till i login then it freezes/gives black load screen -.- anyone please help me :|

Read full topic

item.title: Need jar maker
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Use this in the command line (provided you have set your system variables)
To create an executable jar archive (the one you double click if you have set that with the OS you use):
jar cmf mainclassfile.txt archivename.jar files

Now I’ll explain those arguments:
mainclassfile.txt, just create a file called manifest.txt, and in it have:
Main-Class: themainclass (the one with the main method, or in your case, “server”);

archivename.jar, the name of the jar archive to be create, in this case it would name the jar file ‘archivename.jar’.

files, this is the files to be packed into the jar archive. E.g One.java Two.java, or if you have alot of files, wild card. Example *.java.

Done.

Read full topic
